data.title: A $100,000 Bugatti-Clobbering Race Car For The Street -- /TUNED
data.description: The LS3-powered Drakan is small, nimble and has the same power-to-weight ratio as a Bugatti Veyron. But despite its racecar looks, it won't shatter your spine if you drive it on the street. With Matt Farah.

asset.title: A $100,000 Bugatti-Clobbering Race Car For The Street -- /TUNED
asset.description:
The LS3-powered Drakan is small, nimble and has the same power-to-weight ratio as a Bugatti Veyron. But despite its racecar looks, it won't shatter your spine if you drive it on the street. With Matt Farah. http://www.drakancars.com

data.title: X Games Brazil Victory - Speed Leads Fiesta Podium Sweep
data.description: The 2013 Global Rallycross Championship kicked off at X Games Brazil, and Scott Speed, driver of the Fiesta "Star Car," was the surprise winner.   Speed led a Ford sweep of the podium and a 1-2-3-4-5 Fiesta finish in the exciting race.

asset.title: X Games Brazil Victory - Speed Leads Fiesta Podium Sweep

data.title: The Race That Changed Everything
data.description: Henry Ford was not a racer, but that didn't stop him from getting behind the wheel for a race that is still being talked about 110 years later.  In this video, Edsel B. Ford II tells the story of his great-grandfather and how he beat the best racer in the country with a car he built himself.

data.title: Does Anybody Still Race 10/10ths These Days? - /SHAKEDOWN
data.description: Max Seeger of FastLaneDaily and /DRIVE asks Leo Parente of ShakeDown who asks you-If driving 10/10th is still part of racing these days. Typically, SD brings you evidence and examples, asks your opinion, then seeks your nominations for racers that best embody 10/10th racing. From any generation, any racing discipline.

data.title: Ryan Beat launches his Pro-Lite race truck to a Podium Finish
data.description: Team Gibson racer, Ryan Beat had a solid race weekend at Lucas Oil Off-Road in Arizona taking hisRockstar Energy powered Pro-Lite to a podium finish and earning Fastest Lap.   The great results of the weekend have Ryan Beat starting the season in 2nd, just shy off the leader.

data.title: Brian Deegan on Lucas Oil Off Road Series qualifying at MMP
data.description: Brian Deegan brings the Metal Mulish Ford Ranger and F-150 Raptor to Miller Motorsports Park in Tooele, UT for the seventh and eighth rounds of the 2011 Lucas Oil Off Road Series. Deegan is currently second in both the Pro 2 Unlimited and the Pro  Lite Unlimeted championships heading into the weekend.

data.title: Race of Champions DAY 1 - ROC Nations Cup
data.description: This is DAY 1 of /DRIVE's exclusive broadcast of the 2012 Race of Champions in Bangkok, Thailand. Join Leo Parente, Tommy Kendall, and John Hindhaugh as we bring you full coverage of this epic motorsport event. Watch our on-track action with racers such as Michael Schumacher, Sebastian Vettel, Tom Kristensen, and David Coulthard and other superstars from a myriad of racing disciplines compete head-to-head for the glory of the ROC Cup.

data.title: Which Country Is Most Important To Racing? -- /SHAKEDOWN
data.description: Leo Parente and ShakeDown decide the holidays are the best time for a fight [you know what happens when you go home]. So, let's discuss which country is most important to racing. Let's leave the definition pretty broad. Not limiting your criteria to most wins, best drivers, or most racecars. Just think if that country's contributions to racing were NOT there, how much would it matter?  And when you post your country choice in the comments below, give a bit of your reasoning please.

asset.title: Which Country Is Most Important To Racing? -- /SHAKEDOWN

Just think if that country's contributions to racing were NOT there, how much would it matter?  And when you post your country choice in the comments below, give a bit of your reasoning please.

data.title: Moving Up To Continental Challenge Racing At Daytona - /SHAKEDOWN
data.description: Stevan McAleer won the 2012 Playboy Mazda MX-5 Cup Championship earning him the opportunity to step up to a season of Continental Tire Sports Car Challenge Racing, starting at Daytona, Feb 2013. Leo Parente and ShakeDown interview Stevan to learn how he went from coaching at an indoor kart track to professional auto racing - What it takes, What he did to get there, How he drives the race car so well.

data.title: Ken Block Explains His Racing - /SHAKEDOWN Interview
data.description: Leo Parente and ShakeDown talks Motorsport and Marketing with Ken Block - How he picks the events he races, How KB gets his Fiesta to do the tricks it does, What makes the challenge of WRC so tough.  When Ken visited the /DRIVE studios to talk Gymkhana 5, we had to take the opportunity to get to know Ken Block's racing a little better.  And, of course, we discuss Motorsport Marketing, something KB knows and masters so well.

data.title: Racing The Nürburgring - Leh Keen 'Rain Dance' Interview - /SHAKEDOWN
data.description:
Sports car racer, Leh Keen, and /DRIVE brought you his 'Rain Dance' video - A lap of the 2013 Nurburgring 24, in the rain, at night. This may be the Best. Video. Ever! - To capture the true and challenging essence of sportscar racing. Other sports and motorsport may boast of their 'Extremes', but Leh Keen shows all that HE, a Porsche, and the Nurburgring make for 'The Real Deal'.

Leo Parente and ShakeDown follow-up with Leh to get his thoughts about the 'Rain Dance' experience that was his awesome driving, racing, and car control behind the wheel of his Farnbacher Racing Porsche 997 GT3 R, SP9 class, race car. Plus, Leh Keen shares his secrets on going fast in the rain. And much more.

This video is the perfect complement to his 'Rain Dance' lap.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WAvN0EzEacU
Leh Keen's Rain Dance - 24 Hours Nürburgring - DRIVER'S EYE

http://lehkeen.com/
Leh Keen website

http://www.24h-rennen.de/en/
2013 Nurburgring 24 website

http://www.porsche.com/usa/eventsandracing/motorsport/racingcars/911gt3r-997/
2013 Porsche 997 GT3 R racecar

http://blog.axisofoversteer.com/2013/05/1010ths-blind-in-soggy-green-hell.html
Axis of Oversteer
